content: free pattern turtle duck y a h c o r c y a y h c a o r k c y @ a k @ turtle duck materials 1 beige light 3 cotton yarn 40g light and dark green yarn and 40g gray yarn 2 2 25mm and 2 10mm hook 3 6mm saftey eyes abbreviations -magic_ring magic_ring -single_crochet single_crochet -slip_stitch slip_stitch -st stitch -chain chain -flo front loop only -decrease invisible decrease or decrease -increase increase 2 single_crochet in stitch @kaycrochay head + body r1 magic_ring 6 6 r2 increase 12 r3 single_crochet increase 18 r4 single_crochet 18 r5 single_crochet x3 increase x2 single_crochet x7 increase x2 single_crochet x4 22 r6 single_crochet single_crochet decrease x 5 single_crochet x 2 17 r7 single_crochet decrease x5 single_crochet x2 12 r19 this is how the bottom should look sew the bottom closed r8 decrease x5 single_crochet x2 7 *stuff head as you go* r9 single_crochet 7 r10 increase 14 r11 single_crochet increase 21 r12 single_crochet x11 increase x9 we re going to move the st marker so single_crochet 4 30 r13-14 2 rounds single_crochet 30 before you cut the yarn after sewing bottom closed sew the r15 single_crochet x16 increase x4 single_crochet 10 34 tail together in the 3 inner sts r16 single_crochet decrease x3 single_crochet x9 increase x4 single_crochet x8 decrease x2 33 r17 decrease x5 single_crochet x5 increase x5 single_crochet x7 decrease x3 30 r18 decrease x3 single_crochet x20 decrease x2 25 *stuff body as you go* r 19 slip_stitch x6 single_crochet x14 in flo slip_stitch x5 and fasten_off 25 *sew the bottom closed and sew tail as picture @kaycrochay shows * beak *switch to a 2 10 mm hook* r1 chain 4 r2 single_crochet x3 3 r3-6 3 row ch1 turn single_crochet 3 fold in half and slip_stitch to close the 3 sts shell fold the beak and slip_stitch to close *switch back to a 2 10 mm hook* r1 magic_ring 6 6 *tip to do the bobble r2 increase 12 st you yarn over r3 single_crochet increase 18 insert hook into the st r4-5 2 rounds single_crochet then yarn over pull r6 ch1 bobble st* slip_stitch repeat all around thru 2 loops then leave a long end for sewing also when yarn over insert hook sewing shell remeber to add a little into the same st yarn stuffing in the shell it give it a more over pull thru 4 loops rounded look @kaycrochay assembly + tips 1 sew or glue everything together 2 eyes go b/w r5 and r6 and 4 sts apart 3 beak goes on r6 in b/w eyes 4 i used a brown fabric marker for head you can also use paint for a free pdf version of this pattern please visti ko-fi com/kaycrochay post your creation on insta and tag me @kaycrochay to be featured @kaycrochay
